The customer reviews for this product are generally positive, with many praising its unique and delicious flavors. However some customers have expressed dissatisfaction due to the high price of these products.
Awards:
* "Best Cookbook" by The New York Times
This cookbook is a great addition [to your] kitchen! It's easy on hand cooking that will make you feel like an expert chef in no time." - 5 stars

Product Awards:

"A-1: Best Cookbooks"
"The best cook book I've ever seen!" – Food & Wine magazine.

Reviews from other sources include praise about BOSH’s innovative approach while also noting their ability at making healthy eating accessible."

Customer Reviews (2)
